record.title: DR. WALTER CARL GORDON, JR. POST OFFICE BUILDING
record.narrative:
DR. WALTER CARL GORDON, JR. POST OFFICE BUILDING -- (Senate - November 20, 2008)

[Page: S10768]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H.R. 6859, which is at the desk.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 6859) to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1501 South Slappey Boulevard in Albany, Georgia, as the "Dr. Walter Carl Gordon, Jr. Post Office Building."
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read three times and passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, with no intervening action or debate, and any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The bill (H.R. 6859) was ordered to a third reading, was read the third time, and passed.
